resources.string:
Zingo - Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)


1. What should I do if my payment fails, but the money is debited? 
If your payment fails but the amount has been debited from your account, donâ€™t worry. The amount will be automatically refunded to your original payment method within 4â€“5 business days. 
If it doesnâ€™t reflect in your account by then, feel free to reach us at support@zingo.com or call our 24Ã—7 helpline at 123456789. We are always happy to help!


2. How can I track my order on Zingo? 
Once your order is placed, head over to the â€˜My Ordersâ€™ section to view live updates. Youâ€™ll be able to see the restaurant preparing your food, the delivery partnerâ€™s location, and the estimated arrival time â€” all in real-time!


3. Can I cancel my order after placing it? 
Yes, orders can be canceled within 60 seconds of placement without any charges. After this window, if the restaurant has started preparing your order, cancellation may not be possible or may involve a small charge. 
We recommend reviewing your order carefully before confirming.


4. What if the food delivered is wrong or of poor quality? 
At Zingo, your satisfaction is our top priority. If you receive the wrong item or if the food quality is unsatisfactory, please use the â€˜Report an Issueâ€™ button in the order summary. Our team will review the case and issue a full/partial refund or replacement, depending on the situation.


5. Is contactless delivery available? 
Yes! Simply choose â€˜Contactless Deliveryâ€™ at checkout, and our delivery partner will drop the food at your doorstep while maintaining full safety and hygiene protocols.


6. How do I apply promo codes or discounts? 
Before making the payment, youâ€™ll see a section titled â€œApply Promo Codeâ€ on the checkout screen. Select a valid offer or enter a coupon manually to enjoy savings. 
Pro tip: Keep an eye on the Zingo Offers section for the hottest deals!


7. Are there delivery charges on every order? 
Delivery charges vary depending on your location, distance from the restaurant, and current demand. However, for Zingo Prime members, most deliveries come free or with exclusive discounts.


8. How do I become a Zingo Prime member? 
Zingo Prime is our premium membership offering faster delivery, zero delivery charges on selected restaurants, and special discounts. 
You can subscribe via the â€œZingo Primeâ€ tab in the app and start enjoying the perks instantly!


9. Can I schedule an order in advance? 
Absolutely! Zingo lets you schedule your meal in advance. Just choose the restaurant, pick your food, and select the â€œSchedule for Laterâ€ option at checkout. Your order will be delivered right on time.


10. How can I contact Zingo support?


Weâ€™re here for you!


ðŸ“§ Email: support@zingo.com


ðŸ“ž Phone: 123456789


ðŸ’¬ Or chat with us directly through the â€˜Help and Supportâ€™ section in the app. Our team is available 24Ã—7, because great food and great support should never sleep.

Zingoâ€¦!! - Redefining the Way You Discover and Enjoy Food


At Zingo, we believe that food is more than just a necessity â€” itâ€™s a mood-lifter, a memory-maker, and a comfort zone on a plate. Born from the idea of making food delivery faster, smoother, and more joyful, Zingo is a fresh, bold, and innovative food-tech platform that brings your favorite meals right to your doorstep â€” hot, fast, and hassle-free.


Whether itâ€™s a solo snack at midnight, a family dinner, or a surprise meal for someone special, Zingo ensures your food moments are seamless and satisfying. Weâ€™ve combined cutting-edge technology with a human touch to create a platform that understands your hunger and delivers happiness â€” one meal at a time.


What Makes Zingo Different? 
Speed that Satisfies 
We know hunger doesnâ€™t wait. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re committed to lightning-fast deliveries, with real-time tracking and live updates, so you know exactly when your food will arrive.


Choices You will Crave 
From iconic street food to high-end restaurants, Zingo partners with the best culinary names in your city, ensuring you get the widest range of options tailored to your cravings.


Smarter Ordering Experience 
Our intuitive app learns your taste preferences over time and offers personalized recommendations that make ordering faster and more enjoyable.


Safety First, Always 
We prioritize hygiene and safety in every step â€” from restaurant kitchens to our delivery partners â€” so your meals come with peace of mind and trust.


Support That Actually Supports 
Got an issue? Weâ€™ve got your back. Our 24Ã—7 dedicated customer support team ensures your experience is smooth and stress-free â€” no matter what.


The Vision Behind Zingo 
Weâ€™re not just building a food delivery app â€” weâ€™re building a movement. A movement where food lovers, restaurants, and technology come together to create a smarter, faster, and more delightful food ecosystem. Our goal is to make Zingo not only a service you use â€” but a brand you love and rely on every day.


Licensed and Trusted 
Zingo is proudly licensed under License ID: 123456789, recognized across all Indian states and fully compliant with regulatory standards for all app versions and platforms.


Built with Passion, Driven by You 
From our first order to our next million â€” weâ€™re here because you chose us. Every click, every order, every bite means the world to us. And weâ€™ll continue to push boundaries, improve your experience, and make food delivery something you look forward to, every time.


So whether you are hungry, lazy, busy, or just craving something special â€” Zingoâ€™s got your back. Always.

ZINGO TERMS OF USE


Effective Date: 7 July 2025 
License ID: 123456789 
Applicable in All Indian States and App Versions


Welcome to Zingo , a proprietary platform developed and operated by Zingo Technologies Pvt. Ltd. ("Zingo," "we," "our," or "us"). These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Zingo mobile application, website, and related services (collectively, the "Platform"). By accessing or using our Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the Platform.


1. Eligibility 
You must be at least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into a binding agreement to use the Platform. By using the Platform, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements.


2. Account Registration 
To access certain services, you must register an account with accurate, complete, and updated information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.


3. Use of Platform 
You agree to use the Platform only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You shall not misuse the Platform in any manner that could damage, disable, or impair its functionality.


4. Service Availability 
We strive to ensure uninterrupted availability of the Platform; however, access may be temporarily suspended due to maintenance, upgrades, or unforeseen technical issues. Zingo is not liable for any disruption or unavailability.


5. Ordering and Delivery 
Zingo acts as a facilitator between users and partner restaurants. We do not prepare food or own the kitchens. Order fulfillment, including preparation and packaging, is the sole responsibility of the respective restaurant.


6. Pricing and Payment 
Prices displayed are inclusive of applicable taxes and may vary by location. Payments can be made through secure gateways provided in the app. In case of payment failures where the amount is debited, a refund will be initiated within 4â€“5 business days.


7. Cancellation and Refunds 
 Orders may be canceled within 60 seconds of placement without charge. 
 If the restaurant has already started preparing the order, cancellation requests may be declined or subjected to a cancellation fee. 
 Refunds will be processed based on our internal policies and the nature of the complaint.


8. Promotions and Offers 
Promotional codes, coupons, and offers are subject to their specific terms. Abuse or manipulation of such promotions may lead to account suspension or reversal of benefits.


9. Delivery Agents 
Zingo works with trained delivery partners. While we aim for prompt delivery, delays may occur due to traffic, weather, or operational constraints. We appreciate your patience and understanding in such cases.


10. User Conduct 
You agree not to:

 Use the Platform for unlawful purposes. 
 Post or share offensive, defamatory, or misleading content. 
 Attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems or networks. 
 Interfere with the Platformâ€™s performance or security features.


11. Restaurant Content 
Zingo is not responsible for menu accuracy, food quality, preparation method, hygiene, or availability. Any issues must be addressed with the restaurant via our support tools.


12. Contactless Delivery 
You may opt for contactless delivery during checkout. In this case, our delivery partner will leave the order at your designated location and notify you. Zingo is not responsible for any theft or spoilage after delivery.


13. Feedback and Reviews 
You may submit feedback or reviews regarding your experience. By doing so, you grant Zingo the right to use, reproduce, and display such content for promotional or service improvement purposes.


14. Privacy Policy 
Use of the Platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which outlines how your data is collected, used, stored, and protected. Please review it separately.


15. Intellectual Property 
All trademarks, logos, code, and content on the Platform are owned by Zingo or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or reproduce any content without written permission.


16. ThirdParty Services 
We may use thirdparty services for payments, notifications, analytics, etc. We are not liable for their actions, but we ensure compliance with applicable regulations and best practices.


17. Account Suspension or Termination 
Zingo reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that:

Violate these Terms 
Engage in fraudulent activities 
Cause harm to other users, partners, or the platform

18. Limitation of Liability 
To the maximum extent permitted by law, Zingo shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Platform or from any food item ordered through it.


19. Indemnification 
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Zingo, its affiliates, officers, directors, and employees from any claims, liabilities, or damages resulting from your use or misuse of the Platform.


20. Modification of Terms 
Zingo reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Platform after changes indicates acceptance of the updated Terms. Users are encouraged to review Terms periodically.


21. Governing Law and Jurisdiction 
These Terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in \[Insert City, e.g., Delhi].


22. Force Majeure 
Zingo shall not be held liable for failure to perform any obligation under these Terms if such failure is due to events beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to natural calamities, strikes, pandemics, and government restrictions.


23. Entire Agreement 
These Terms constitute the entire agreement between the user and Zingo regarding the use of the Platform and supersede any prior agreements.


24. Severability 
If any provision of these Terms is found to be unlawful, void, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue to be valid and enforceable.


25. Contact Information 
For any legal notices, feedback, complaints, or questions regarding these Terms:


 Email: [support@zingo.com](mailto:support@zingo.com) 
 Phone: 123456789 
 Registered Office: \[LPU Jalandhar]


 By using Zingo, you agree to these Terms of Use. Thank you for choosing Zingo!

ZINGO PRIVACY POLICY


Effective Date: 7th July 2025 
License ID: 123456789 
Jurisdiction: India (Applicable across all states and app versions)

Zingo Technologies Pvt. Ltd. ("Zingo," "we," "our," or "us") values the trust you place in us. We are committed to protecting your privacy through responsible and transparent data practices. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the rights you have over your personal data. By accessing or using the Zingo application, website, or services ("Platform"), you agree to this Privacy Policy.


1. Information We Collect 
We collect the following types of information:


a) Personal Information: 
Name, mobile number, email address 
Delivery address and location data 
Date of birth (if voluntarily provided) 
Payment method details (processed securely via thirdparty gateways)


b) Usage Data: 
Device type, model, and unique identifiers (IMEI, MAC address) 
IP address, browser type, operating system 
App activity logs, crash reports, and system diagnostics


c) Location Information: 
GPS and networkbased location data when the app is in use (for delivery tracking, order relevance, and user personalization)


d) Cookies and Tracking Technologies: 
Session cookies, persistent cookies, and tracking pixels to personalize your experience and improve our service


2. How We Use Your Information


Your information is used strictly for legitimate purposes, including: 
Processing and delivering orders 
Managing user accounts and preferences 
Sending transaction alerts and promotional messages (with optout option) 
Customer service and support 
Ensuring security and preventing fraud 
Improving app performance, UI/UX, and operational efficiency


3. Data Sharing and Disclosure


We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may share data only under these conditions: 
With delivery partners to fulfill your orders 
With restaurants to process and prepare your selected meals 
With thirdparty service providers (payment gateways, SMS/email vendors, cloud storage, etc.) under strict confidentiality agreements 
With legal authorities when required by law, regulation, or in response to a lawful request


4. Data Retention 
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes listed in this policy or as required by applicable laws. After this period, data is securely deleted or anonymized.


5. Data Security


We implement robust security measures to protect your information: 
SSL encryption for data transmission 
Secure servers with access controls 
Regular security audits and updates 
Rolebased access within our organization


Despite our efforts, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We shall not be held liable for breaches beyond our reasonable control.


6. Your Rights


Subject to applicable law, you have the following rights: 
Access and review your personal data 
Request correction of inaccurate data 
Request deletion of your data 
Optout of marketing communications 
Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent


To exercise any of these rights, contact us at [privacy@zingo.com](mailto:privacy@zingo.com) or use the inapp support.


7. Privacy of children 
Our Platform is not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If we become aware of such data collection, we will promptly delete the information.


8. ThirdParty Links 
Our Platform may contain links to thirdparty websites or services. We are not responsible for their content, practices, or privacy policies. Users are encouraged to read those policies separately.


9. Changes to This Policy 
We reserve the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Updates will be posted on the app and website. Continued use of the Platform after such changes signifies your acceptance of the revised policy.


10. Grievance Officer 
In compliance with the Information Technology Act, 2000 and rules made thereunder, the name and contact details of the Grievance Officer are:


Name: \[Insert Name] 
Email: [grievance@zingo.com](mailto:grievance@zingo.com) 
Phone: 123456789 
Address: \[Insert Office Address]


11. Contact Us 
For any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact:


Email: [privacy@zingo.com](mailto:privacy@zingo.com) 
Phone: 123456789 
Zingo Technologies Pvt. Ltd.


By using Zingo, you consent to this Privacy Policy and the data practices described herein.

1. First Order Gift â€“ Welcome to Zingo!

Surprise your loved ones with Zingo digital gift cards starting from â‚¹200 to â‚¹2000. Perfect for birthdays, thank-yous, or just-because moments.


3. Smart Save Vouchers â€“ Every Bite, More Value! 
Use your earned vouchers at checkout to save up to 50% on select restaurants. Zingo makes every order feel like a smart choice.


4. Daily Zingo Deals â€“ Right in Your Inbox! 
Get exclusive daily deals and time-limited promo codes delivered via email, SMS and app notifications. Donâ€™t miss out â€“ they disappear fast!


5. Refer and Earn â€“ Share Food, Earn Rewards! 
Invite your friends to Zingo and earn â‚¹75 Zingo Cash for every successful referral. 
Your friend gets â‚¹50 off too. Everyone wins when good food is shared!


6. Weekly Winner Bonus

Apply combo coupons on partner restaurants and enjoy â€œBuy 1 Get 1 Freeâ€ or 25% off on orders above â‚¹299.

Celebrate your special day with Zingo! Get a flat 20% off on your birthday order. Because food tastes better on your big day.


9. Instant Cashback Offers 
Pay via selected wallets like Paytm, PhonePe, or ZingoPay and get instant cashback of up to â‚¹75 on eligible orders. Fast. Easy. Rewarding.


10. Zingo Prime Exclusive Coupons 
Zingo Prime members enjoy exclusive monthly coupon drops, including free delivery and priority discounts on premium outlets.


11. Corporate Vouchers â€“ Office Lunches, Sorted 
Need to treat your team or clients? Zingoâ€™s Corporate Gifting lets you send bulk vouchers and meal credits with ease and class.


12. Track Your Rewards Easily 
All your vouchers, referral cash, and gift cards are neatly stored in your â€œZingo Walletâ€ â€” ready to use whenever hunger strikes!
